nodes.text: Darth Vader 2 is the second issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Darth Vader. It was written by Greg Pak, illustrated by Raffaele Ienco, and published on March 11, 2020 by Marvel Comics. The issue features the story "Dark Heart of the Sith Part II," in which Darth Vader comes face to face with Sabé, a former handmaiden of the late Padmé Amidala.

THE FACE OF THE QUEEN! In the wake of the shocking revelations of The Empire Strikes Back, DARTH VADER continues his quest for revenge against everyone who hid his son Luke from him. But when his search takes him deep into his past, he uncovers a hauntingly familiar face that will challenge everything he knows.
